Class.ClassComment: CacheEventConverterFactory /** * Factory that can produce CacheEventConverters * @author wburns * @since 7.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Retrieves a cache event converter instance from this factory. * @param params parameters for the factory to be used to create converter instances * @return a {@link org.infinispan.notifications.cachelistener.filter.CacheEventConverter} instance usedto reduce size of event payloads */
